amendment.description: Amendment requires that certain vessel propellers and ship propulsion shafting procured with funds under the bill be manufactured in the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment preprinted in the Congressional Record of August 3, as amendment No. 73, to require that funds appropriated for the purchase of vessel propellers be used only for products poured and made in the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Callahan amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
